tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive credit reports and ratings from major credit rating agencies for supplier evaluation.

supplier_name.description: Legal name of the supplier company

supplier_tax_id.description: Tax identification number or EIN of the supplier

credit_bureau.description: Preferred credit bureau: EXPERIAN, EQUIFAX, DUNS_BRADSTREET

error_messages: Supplier not found: No credit record found for the provided company name and tax ID combination. Verify the information is correct.
Invalid tax ID format: Tax ID must be in valid format (XX-XXXXXXX for EIN).
Unsupported credit bureau: Use one of [EXPERIAN, EQUIFAX, DUNS_BRADSTREET].
Credit report unavailable: Credit report temporarily unavailable from the bureau. Try again later or use a different bureau.
Insufficient credit history: Supplier has limited credit history for comprehensive evaluation.
usage: Provide supplier_name and supplier_tax_id. Optionally specify credit_bureau. Returns detailed credit information including scores, payment history, and public records.

credit_score.description: Numerical credit score from the bureau

payment_history.description: Summary of payment behavior and trends
